message_points_has_been_added: We have credited you {points} on card {userCardNumber}.
message_points_has_been_spent_because_re: We have deducted {points} from card {userCardNumber} for reward {rewardName}.
message_coupon_has_been_issued_to_you: Coupon '{}' has been assigned to you
mail_change_password_request_body: You have changed your password in the application. To confirm the password change, open the page by clicking on the button below, where you will complete the password change by confirmation. The link to the page is valid for one day. If you have not changed your password, ignore this email.
html_change_password_text: To confirm password change, please click the button below.
html_password_changed_text: Your password has been successfully changed.
mail_confirm_email_body: Thank you for registering with Vega Cards! To confirm your email, click the button below. Confirmation must be done within three days!
html_link_expired_body: The link is no longer valid. Please repeat the operation.
mail_change_password_request_continue: Open the page to confirm the password change
